description:
💥 PREDATOR: BADLANDS — “Dek vs Njohrr” Fight Scene (2025) | Movie Clip in 4K
When the hunter fails his father, the clan’s wrath becomes the prey. In this brutal fight sequence from Predator: Badlands, young Yautja warrior Dek confronts his father, clan-leader Njohrr — a clash of honor, survival and predator legacy.

🔍 Clip Overview

On Yautja Prime, Dek stands accused of weakness. His father Njohrr demands his death to preserve the clan’s strength. The combat is merciless: bio-lasers, plasma blades, antlered helmets — and an unrelenting stare of a father who sees only failure. According to pre-release lore, Njohrr even orders Dek’s older brother to kill him.

The scene is raw and emotional, redefining what a Predator fight can be: not just monster vs human — but monster vs monster, legacy vs uprising.
